title: Gaimanova Mogila
description: A Scythian burial site containing burials from the fourth to second centuries B.C.; located near the Dnieper River, southeast of the modern village of Balky.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate location of Gaimanova Mogila, after Bidzili͡a & Polin 2012.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Gaimanova Mogila
